name: article-bookmarklet-service
description: Cloud service that sends articles to both Kindle and Zotero via bookmarklet

scripts.build: npm run setup:submodules && npm run setup:python
scripts.setup:submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive || echo 'Submodule setup skipped in deployment'
scripts.setup:python: python3 -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt || echo 'Python setup skipped in deployment'
